G

GameController - Class in controller
The Board and GameView of the game, as well as the processing of user interactions, are all managed by the GameController class.
GameController() - Constructor for class controller.GameController
 
GameState - Enum in model
The GameState class is an enumeration that stores constants used to indicate the current game state during each iteration.
GameStateMemento - Class in memento
This class applies the memento design pattern to store a snapshot of the game state at a specific point in time.
GameStateMemento(GameState) - Constructor for class memento.GameStateMemento
Constructor
GameView - Class in view
The GameView class is responsible for creating the user interface using Java Swing.
GameView() - Constructor for class view.GameView
Constructor
